%1$s tidak didukung! Pilih Server Otomatis pilih Server Jadikan Default Pengisi Dewasa List Only Tag Tags Sinonim Cuplikan Pembukaan Akhir Prequel Sequel
Pengaturan Anilist Downloads Pengaturan Pengaturan Player Hanya tampilkan Acara Saya di Update Terbaru Download Manager Download di SD card Tidak ada kartu SD Ditemukan. Pengaturan Pembaca Sumber Bawaan Tampilkan Tautan Youtube Tata Letak Episode Default Tata Letak Chapter Default Antarmuka pengguna Umum Tema pengaturan UI Tentang " Anime Stream dibuat berdasarkan keanggunan yang sederhana namun canggih. Ini adalah satu-satunya klien Anilist, yang juga memungkinkan Anda streaming-unduh Anime & Manga.
 Nah, kami ingin mengatakan ini adalah aplikasi sumber terbuka terbaik untuk anime dan manga di Android, bagaimana menurut Anda?" Pengembang Penafian
- Anime Stream hanya mengorek link dari berbagai website dan memudahkan pengguna untuk menemukan anime dan manga. 

 - Anime Stream atau salah satu pengembang/stafnya tidak menyimpan konten apa pun yang ditemukan di dalam Saikou. Setiap dan semua informasi gambar dan anime/manga yang ditemukan di aplikasi diambil dari berbagai API publik (AniList, MyAnimeList, Kitsu). 

 - Selain itu, semua link anime/manga yang terdapat di Anime Stream diambil dari berbagai situs hosting anime pihak ke-3. 

 - Anime Stream atau pemiliknya tidak bertanggung jawab atas penyalahgunaan konten apa pun yang ditemukan di dalam atau di luar aplikasi dan tidak dapat dimintai pertanggungjawaban atas distribusi konten apa pun yang ditemukan di dalam aplikasi. 

 - Dengan menggunakan Anime Stream, Anda mematuhi fakta bahwa pengembang aplikasi tidak bertanggung jawab atas konten apa pun yang ditemukan di aplikasi; meskipun demikian mereka mungkin atau mungkin tidak berasal dari sumber yang sah. 

 - Jika masalah pelanggaran internet terlibat, silakan hubungi situs web sumber. Pengembang tidak memikul tanggung jawab hukum apa pun.

Video Tampilkan Info Video Tampilkan Info Sumber Menampilkan Resolusi dari pemutaran video saat ini, berguna untuk "Multi Kualitas" Server. Pemilihan Kualitas Otomatis Tinggi Lebar Secara otomatis menggunakan kualitas terdekat yang disediakan secara default, HANYA diterapkan "Multi Kualitas" Servers. Perubahan otomatis saat memutar video. (di mana latar belakang tidak)" Note: Mengubah pemformatan Subtitle hanya berfungsi dengan Sumber Soft-Subbed seperti Kaido! Subtitle Font Subtitle Size
Otomatis Putar Otomatis Episode Berikutnya Nonaktifkan secara otomatis jika tidak ada interaksi dengan player setelah 1 jam. Otomatis Skip Fillers Melewatkan episode filler saat melanjutkan ke episode berikutnya.
Perbarui Kemajuan Mintalah setiap Anime "Secara individu" Mintalah setiap Manga "Secara individu" Mematikan akan selalu memperbarui progres secara otomatis saat episode ditonton. Mematikan akan selalu memperbarui progres secara otomatis saat chapter dibaca. Perbarui Kemajuan untuk Hentai Perbarui Kemajuan untuk Doujin sangat berani dari Anda sar Tonton Persentase Pembaruan Persentase progres Anilist Anda harus diperbarui setelah menonton sebuah episode. 
Ini juga mengatur \% kapan pramuat tautan untuk episode berikutnya.
Perilaku Selalu Lanjutkan dari tempat Anda tinggalkan Jeda saat tidak dalam Fokus Volume & Gerakan Kecerahan Ketuk dua kali untuk Mencari Mematikan akan menampilkan maju cepat & tombol memutar ulang Carilah Waktu Jumlah waktu dalam detik untuk maju cepat & memutar ulang. Waktu Skip Mengatur ke 0, menyembunyikan Tombol Lewati. Tampilkan Tombol Cast Memerlukan "Web Video Caster" app to cast. Picture in Picture Selalu Minimize Membutuhkan PiP untuk diaktifkan, membuat pemain berperilaku seperti Youtube Player tetapi lebih baik.
Juga menyembunyikan tombol PiP.

Pengaturan Default Bilah Gulir Horizontal Halaman Ganda Menampilkan 2 Gambar dalam 1 halaman, akan terlihat aneh jika ukuran gambar tidak sama Warna sebenarnya (Mode warna 32-bit) Mengurangi Banding pada gambar, dapat mempengaruhi kinerja. Anilist How does this work\?
Saikou is an Anilist Based App, so for syncing with your MAL Account, It needs an Anilist account to be logged in. 
Once logged in with both Anilist and MAL accounts, the app will automatically update your MAL account whenever: 
- Add a new Media 
- Edit a Media 
- Delete a Media


Note: The app will not sync old Media's from Anilist to MAL, It's recommended to sync them. 
- Check __FAQs__ for _Easy Method_


And for _Intermediates_ : 
- [How to sync Anilist data with MAL](https://anilist.co/forum/thread/2654) 
- [How to sync MAL data with Anilist](https://anilist.co/forum/thread/3393)


_It is not required to sync both MAL and Anilist accounts._

What is Saikou?
 Why should you use Saikou? Saikou is crafted based on simplistic yet state-of-the-art elegance. It is an Anilist only client, which also lets you stream-download Anime & Manga. We plan on adding MyAnimeList support very soon.
Saikou (最高; Sai-kō) literally means the best in Japanese. Well, we would like to say this is the best open source app for anime and manga on Android, but hey, Try it out yourself & judge!
What are some features of Saikou? Some mentionable features of Saikou are

- Easy and functional way to both, watch anime and read manga and light novels, Ad Free.
- A completely open source app with a nice UI & Animations
- The most Efficient scraping for anime and manga from multiple sources. (Spoiler Alert : No web-views were harmed)
- Synchronize anime and manga real-time with AniList. Easily categorize anime and manga based on your current status. (Powered by AniList)
- Find all shows using thoroughly and frequently updated list of all trending, popular and ongoing anime based on scores.
- View extensive details about anime shows, movies and manga titles. It also features ability to countdown to the next episode of airing anime. (Powered by AniList & MyAnimeList)
What are Artifacts? Whenever a developer commits or pull requests a feature or fix, GitHub automatically makes an APK file for you to use. This APK is called an Artifact. Artifacts through pull requests may or may not be added to the main release of the app. Artifacts have a higher chance of having bugs and glitches. To know if new artifacts are available, star the saikou repository and turn on notifications

To download an Artifact:
1) Sign In/Up in GitHub
2) Go to saikou
3) Go to actions
4) Press on the workflow run you want to download the artifact of.
5) Press on artifact
6) Extract the file using a zip extractor
7) Install and enjoy.
Is Saikou available for PC? Currently no (for both Windows and Linux). There isn't any estimation when it will be available. But you can download any Android emulator and run Saikou on it. For Windows 11 users, they can use the Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA) to run Saikou in Windows.
Is Saikou available for iOS? Saikou for iOS is now under development with the name "SaikouS". You can download the builds uploaded by the respective developer from our [discord server](https://discord.gg/2T7TunuwFZ). 

Press [here](https://github.com/5H4D0WILA/SaikouS) if you want to check out the GitHub Repository.
Why are my stats not updating? This is because it updates every 48 hours automatically (by Anilist). If you really need to update your stats, you can force update your stats after going to this [link](https://anilist.co/settings/lists).
How to download Episodes? 1. Download 1DM or ADM from Google Play Store. 
2. Enter the app, give storage access and set your preferences (downloading speed, downloading path etc(optional)) 
3. Now go to Saikou > Settings > Common > Download Managers and choose the download manager you just set up. 
4. Go to your desired episode and press on the download icon of any server. There may be a popup to set your preferences again, just press on "Download" and it will be saved in the directed path.


Note: Direct downloads are also possible without a manager but it's not recommended.
How to download Manga Chapters? It is yet not possible to download chapters in Saikou but this feature will be implemented soon.
How to enable NSFW content? You can enable nsfw content by enabling 18+ contents from this [link](https://anilist.co/settings/media).
How to import my MAL/Kitsu list to Anilist? Here is how you do it,

Export:

1. Go to this [link](https://malscraper.azurewebsites.net).
2. Give your Kitsu/MAL username and download both anime and manga list. (They will be in XML format)
Note: You have to write the username of the tracker you selected

Import:

1. After exporting your anime and manga list from Kitsu/MAL, now go [here](https://anilist.co/settings/import) 
2. Select/drop the anime XML file on the box above.
|→Select/drop the manga XML file on the box below.
How to import my Anilist/Kitsu list to MAL? Here is how you do it,

Export:

1. Go to this [link](https://malscraper.azurewebsites.net/). 
2. Give your Anilist username/Kitsu ID in the 'Username/Kitsu User ID' box. 
3. Select list type and enable 'update_on_import'. 
4. Download the file; it will be in .xml format. Be sure to download both Anime and Manga lists.

Import:
1. To import it in your MAL account, go to this [link](https://myanimelist.net/import.php) and choose 'MyAnimeList Import' as import type. 
2. Press on 'Choose File'and select the downloaded anime/manga list XML file. 
3. Press on 'Import Data'. 
Congratulations, you just imported the selected list to your MAL account.
Why can't I find a specific anime/manga title? Let's say you are looking for Castlevania in Saikou. But Anilist doesn't have it, so Saikou doesn't either.
A solution to the above problem is as follows:
1) Go to any anime that's not in your list.
2) Go to the watch section.
3) Select any source and press on the 'Wrong Title?'.
4) Now search for Castlevania (The anime you were looking for) and select it.
5) ENJOY!

If you can't find the anime even through these steps, then that's bad luck for you, bud. Even that source doesn't have it. Try a different source.
How to fix sources selecting a completely wrong title? Saikou itself doesn't host anything but relies on other sources. When showing the episodes, it chooses the 1st result given by the source after searching for the title. Saikou has no way of detecting if that's legit or not. So, for this, we have the 'Wrong Title?' just below the source name(above layouts). You can choose the correct result/title by pressing on it and enjoy its episodes.
How to read coloured mangas? Are you in search of coloured manga? Sorry to break it to you but an extremely small amount of mangas have coloured version. Those which has a coloured version is also available in Saikou. Let's say you want to read the coloured version of chainsaw man. Then follow the below steps ↓

1) Go to Chainsaw Man
2) Press on 'Read'
3) Select any working source
4) Press on 'Wrong Title'
5) Select the colored version chainsaw man
6) Enjoy

Note: Many sources don't have the coloured version available even if it's available somewhere on the internet. So try a different source. If none of the sources have it, then a coloured version of your desired manga simply doesn't exist. If you can find it on any manga site on the internet, you can suggest that site through the Discord server.
Handshake fails? Why are no timestamps not loading? You can fix this issue by enabling 'Proxy' from 
\`Settings > Anime > Player Settings > Timestamps > Proxy\`.
If the timestamps are still not loading but the handshake failed popup is fixed, then the episode you are watching just doesn't have timestamps yet for it.
Having trouble with a source? Some basic fixes would be :

• Restart the app. 
• Use a different DNS from your settings, preferably, CloudFlare. 
• VPN might work as well. 

If you refuse to try the above steps then just use a different source.

Note: Allanime fixes itself most of the time.
Some useful tips and tricks The following presents some tips and tricks you may or may not know about - 
 
 
 - By hold pressing the Saikou logo in settings, you can check if there are any new updates manually. 
 
 - Hold pressing an error message/tag/synonym or title will copy it. 
 
 - You can open an episode with other apps by hold pressing any server for that episode. This helps in streaming the episode using other video players or download the episode using download managers. 
 
 - You can set up custom lists using this [link](https://anilist.co/settings/lists). (you need to be signed in) 
 
 - If your episode/chapter is not being progressed automatically after you finish watching/reading it, then hold press the status bar(planning/repeating/watching button) of that anime/manga. The next time you start a chapter/finish an episode, you will stumble upon a popup. Press yes there.
Subscribed! Receiving notifications, when new episodes are released on %1$s.
Unsubscribed, you will not receive any notifications. Episodes Episode Chapter Chapters
